languages.text: "Кровью своей, волей своей мы вместе сплетем алую сеть — символ охоты. Предвестницу загнанной добычи". {n}Девушка вкладывает в вашу руку кинжал, и вы вдруг ощущаете, какими тяжелыми становятся веки. Замедляется биение сердца в груди. Слова ее то растягиваются, то проносятся в сознании единым потоком. Тяжелый аромат благовоний укутывает вас и кружит голову.{/n}

"With our blood, with our will, we shall spin a scarlet web, the symbol of the hunt. May it herald our prey's demise." {n}Kibellah puts the dagger into your hand, and you suddenly feel how heavy your eyelids have become. Your heartbeat slows inside your chest. Her words linger, then rush through your mind in a deluge. The heavy scent of incense envelops you and makes your head spin.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Кровью своей, волей своей мы вместе сплетем алую сеть — символ охоты. Предвестницу загнанной добычи". {n}Девушка вкладывает в вашу руку кинжал, и вы вдруг ощущаете, какими тяжелыми становятся веки. Замедляется биение сердца в груди. Слова ее то растягиваются, то проносятся в сознании единым потоком. Тяжелый аромат благовоний укутывает вас и кружит голову.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "With our blood, with our will, we shall weave a scarlet net, the symbol of the hunt. May it herald the hunted prey." {n}Kibellah puts the dagger into your hand, and you suddenly feel how heavy your eyelids have become. Your heartbeat slows down inside your chest. Her words linger, then rush through your mind in a deluge. The heavy scent of incense envelops you and makes your head spin.{/n}

Her words linger, then rush through your mind in a deluge. The heavy scent of incense envelops you and makes your head spin.{/n}

languages.text: "Mit unserem Blut und unserem Willen, werden wir ein rotes Netz spinnen, das Symbol der Jagd. Möge es vom Untergang unserer Beute künden." {n}Kibellah legt den Dolch in deine Hand, und plötzlich spürst du, wie schwer deine Augenlider geworden sind. Dein Herzschlag in deiner Brust verlangsamt sich. Ihre Worte verharren und branden dann wie eine Flutwelle durch deinen Geist. Der schwere Duft von Weihrauch umfängt dich, und lässt dich schwindeln.{/n}
languages.original_text: "With our blood, with our will, we shall spin a scarlet web, the symbol of the hunt. May it herald our prey's demise." {n}Kibellah puts the dagger into your hand, and you suddenly feel how heavy your eyelids have become. Your heartbeat slows inside your chest. Her words linger, then rush through your mind in a deluge. The heavy scent of incense envelops you and makes your head spin.{/n}

Möge es vom Untergang unserer Beute künden." {n}Kibellah legt den Dolch in deine Hand, und plötzlich spürst du, wie schwer deine Augenlider geworden sind. Dein Herzschlag in deiner Brust verlangsamt sich. Ihre Worte verharren und branden dann wie eine Flutwelle durch deinen Geist. Der schwere Duft von Weihrauch umfängt dich, und lässt dich schwindeln.{/n}

languages.text: «Con nuestra sangre, con nuestra voluntad, tejeremos una red escarlata, el símbolo de la caza. Que anuncie la muerte de nuestra presa». {n}Kibellah coloca la daga en tu mano, y de repente tus párpados se vuelven muy pesados. Tus latidos se ralentizan en tu pecho. Sus palabras se quedan en el aire para después atravesar tu mente como un torrente. El fuerte aroma del incienso te envuelve y te marea.{/n}
languages.original_text: "With our blood, with our will, we shall spin a scarlet web, the symbol of the hunt. May it herald our prey's demise." {n}Kibellah puts the dagger into your hand, and you suddenly feel how heavy your eyelids have become. Your heartbeat slows inside your chest. Her words linger, then rush through your mind in a deluge. The heavy scent of incense envelops you and makes your head spin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Con nuestra sangre, con nuestra voluntad, tejeremos una red escarlata, el símbolo de la caza. Que anuncie la muerte de nuestra presa». {n}Kibellah coloca la daga en tu mano, y de repente tus párpados se vuelven muy pesados. Tus latidos se ralentizan en tu pecho. Sus palabras se quedan en el aire para después atravesar tu mente como un torrente. El fuerte aroma del incienso te envuelve y te marea.{/n}

languages.text: 「我々の血、我々の意志で、狩りの象徴たる緋色の網を織る。獲物の終焉を告げるものであらんことを」{n}キベラが短剣をこちらの手に持たせると、突然、まぶたが重くなるのを感じた。胸の鼓動が遅くなる。彼女の言葉がずっと耳に残って、そして洪水のように心へ流れ込んできた。お香の強い香りに包まれて、頭がクラクラする。{/n}
languages.original_text: "With our blood, with our will, we shall spin a scarlet web, the symbol of the hunt. May it herald our prey's demise." {n}Kibellah puts the dagger into your hand, and you suddenly feel how heavy your eyelids have become. Your heartbeat slows inside your chest. Her words linger, then rush through your mind in a deluge. The heavy scent of incense envelops you and makes your head spin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「我々の血、我々の意志で、狩りの象徴たる緋色の網を織る。獲物の終焉を告げるものであらんことを」{n}キベラが短剣をこちらの手に持たせると、突然、まぶたが重くなるのを感じた。胸の鼓動が遅くなる。彼女の言葉がずっと耳に残って、そして洪水のように心へ流れ込んできた。お香の強い香りに包まれて、頭がクラクラする。{/n}

languages.text: “通过鲜血与意志，我们将编织一张深红色的罗网。这是狩猎的象征，愿它昭示着猎物的死亡。”{n}绮贝菈将匕首塞到你手里。你突然感觉眼皮变得无比沉重，心跳也变得越来越慢。她的话语萦绕在你耳边，之后变得如同洪水一般，在你脑海中奔涌。浓郁的熏香味围绕着你，令你头晕目眩。{/n}
languages.original_text: "With our blood, with our will, we shall spin a scarlet web, the symbol of the hunt. May it herald our prey's demise." {n}Kibellah puts the dagger into your hand, and you suddenly feel how heavy your eyelids have become. Your heartbeat slows inside your chest. Her words linger, then rush through your mind in a deluge. The heavy scent of incense envelops you and makes your head spin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “通过鲜血与意志，我们将编织一张深红色的罗网。这是狩猎的象征，愿它昭示着猎物的死亡。”{n}绮贝菈将匕首塞到你手里。你突然感觉眼皮变得无比沉重，心跳也变得越来越慢。她的话语萦绕在你耳边，之后变得如同洪水一般，在你脑海中奔涌。浓郁的熏香味围绕着你，令你头晕目眩。{/n}

languages.text: « Par notre sang, par notre volonté, nous tisserons une toile écarlate, symbole de la chasse. Puisse-t-il augurer la mort de notre proie. » {n}Kibellah place la dague dans votre main et vous sentez soudain combien vos paupières sont lourdes. Votre cœur ralentit. Ses mots restent en suspens, puis se bousculent dans votre esprit avec la violence d'un déluge, tandis que l'odeur entêtante de l'encens vous enveloppe et vous donne le vertige.{/n}
languages.original_text: "With our blood, with our will, we shall spin a scarlet web, the symbol of the hunt. May it herald our prey's demise." {n}Kibellah puts the dagger into your hand, and you suddenly feel how heavy your eyelids have become. Your heartbeat slows inside your chest. Her words linger, then rush through your mind in a deluge. The heavy scent of incense envelops you and makes your head spin.{/n}

languages.text: "Kanımızla ve irademizle avın sembolü olan kızıl bir ağ öreceğiz. Kızıl ağ, avımızın nihayete erişini müjdelesin." {n}Kibellah, hançeri avuçlarına bırakıyor. Aniden göz kapaklarının ne kadar ağırlaştığını hissediyorsun. Göğüs kafesinin içinde kalbinin atışları yavaşlıyor. Sözleri ağırlaşıyor, ardından sel misali telaşla zihnine akıyor. Tütsünün ağır kokusu seni sararak başını döndürüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "With our blood, with our will, we shall spin a scarlet web, the symbol of the hunt. May it herald our prey's demise." {n}Kibellah puts the dagger into your hand, and you suddenly feel how heavy your eyelids have become. Your heartbeat slows inside your chest.
